list.name: Default
list.comment:
Haven't done this yet:
Need to get a sales breakdown overview. Also, need custom form inputting (for rands or potentially dollars in the future) for models not using the model form. Need to add a form wrapper per field so users can add other models whilst adding models.
Need menu widget in the header. All models need date added.
Required to add editing of company, company representative, and to neaten by adding files to group all this crap together. Finally, delete sale, meeting, company and company representative needs to be added.
Required to edit the success edit and added pages for all models to allow a link back to the profile.
Got rid of the hideous red ugly buttons on the page, and opted for heading in line buttons to take user to sub-dashboards. Added the successfully edited and added things for meeting, company and company representative. Still need to fix the delete return html, or develop my own one.

component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary: Added buttons to SalesPersonDetail for adding meetings and sales.
Added correct redirects: homepage redirects you to login if not logged in.
Added Company add for user: Users can now add companies to the database.
Added Company add for user: Users can now add companies to the database.
Added many features, including links back to viewing pages and being able to see totals of the user.
Added the superuser feature, where the admin can view anyone's profile, but not add sales on a user's behalf.

Changed the SalesPersonDetail.html page to display meetings and upcoming sales. Will add the ability to view sales individually at a later point, as well as to get a sales breakdown overview. Also, need to add the form editing function and custom form inputting for models not using the model form. Further, extends base needs to be reviewed, so the web pages have some sort of design behind them.

Haven't done this yet:(Need to get a sales breakdown overview. Also, need custom form inputting (for rands or potentially dollars in the future) for models not using the model form. Need to add a form wrapper per field so users can add other models whilst adding models. Need to reposition the header logout button position.)
Need menu widget in the header. All models need date added, and need to add quote number for MPT to sale model.
Added sale probability and status. Added a manager overview of a person's sales, as well as the ability to edit those sales. Required to add editing of meeting, company, company representative, and to neaten by adding files to group all this crap together. Buttons also need to be made to loo smaller, and need to neaten the looks of the files. Finally, delete sale, meeting, company and company representative needs to be added.

Haven't done this yet:
Need to get a sales breakdown overview. Also, need custom form inputting (for rands or potentially dollars in the future) for models not using the model form. Need to add a form wrapper per field so users can add other models whilst adding models. Need to reposition the header logout button position.
Need menu widget in the header. All models need date added, and need to add quote number for MPT to sale model.
Required to add editing of company, company representative, and to neaten by adding files to group all this crap together. Buttons also need to be made to look smaller. Finally, delete sale, meeting, company and company representative needs to be added.
Added a successfully edited meeting page

Moved the header links to the right, and added a "View My Sales" and "My Dash Board" link to the header bar.

MESSAGE.value: Added buttons to SalesPersonDetail for adding meetings and sales.
Added correct redirects: homepage redirects you to login if not logged in.
Added Company add for user: Users can now add companies to the database.
Added many features, including links back to viewing pages and being able to see totals of the user.
Added the superuser feature, where the admin can view anyone's profile, but not add sales on a user's behalf.

Changed the SalesPersonDetail.html page to display meetings and upcoming sales. Will add the ability to view sales individually at a later point, as well as to get a sales breakdown overview. Also, need to add the form editing function and custom form inputting for models not using the model form. Further, extends base needs to be reviewed, so the web pages have some sort of design behind them.
